mapper.insert: insert into bid values( bid_no_seq.nextVal, #{ pNo }, #{ startPrice }, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP + NUMTODSINTERVAL(#{ remaningTime }, 'DAY'), default, #{ autoExtension }, default, default, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP + NUMTODSINTERVAL(#{ remaningTime }, 'DAY') )
mapper.update: update bid set entryBidPrice=#{entryBidPrice},remaningTime=(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '1' DAY),registrationTime=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,autoExtension=#{autoExtension},earlyTermination=#{earlyTermination},miniBidUnit=#{miniBidUnit},endDate=(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '1' DAY) where bidNo=#{bidNo}
mapper.delete: delete from bid where bidNo=#{ bidNo }
